title: POORAIM
descrption: POORAIM is a backdoor used by APT37 in campaigns since at least 2014. [1]

references.title: FireEye. (2018, February 20). APT37 (Reaper): The Overlooked North Korean Actor. Retrieved March 1, 2018.

related.Name: Drive-by Compromise
related.Use: POORAIM has been delivered through compromised sites acting as watering holes.[1]

related.Name: System Information Discovery
related.Use: POORAIM can identify system information, including battery status.[1]

related.Name: Web Service
related.Use: POORAIM has used AOL Instant Messenger for C2.[1]
